Item.Value: Hi, I'm $0$, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm the healer in town. Hopefully I won't have to be seeing you too often.
Hello $^$. I hope you're well today.
You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.
Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?
Hello, what can I do for you?.[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Nothing]
Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.
Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.
Oh thank Heavens! I was afraid you wouldn't wake! I hate to ask, but it does takefunds to keep my hospital running. Would you mind donating? [Yes:Donate|No:NoDonate]
